name: Celluvas
description:
Celluvas, a puzzle-platformer game

Duke Byron has been giving humanity a hard time lately. You may have heard of him… 

The Professor has been researching for a long time to find out the remedy that can finally stop him, and he discovered the Celluvas! Round-shaped coloured creatures that play around in the laboratory. 

 And finally, there is Whitley. 

He is not like the other Celluvas.  Oh no... a strange unique mutation. The one and only with the power to save humanity from Duke Byron. The chosen one, pretty much.

But, he has not been discovered yet! Far away he can see the microscope. He must get there ASAP! Luckily for you… the rest of the Celluvas are ready to help.

-Reunite and split up groups of Celluvas!

-Transform into amazing creatures and obtain new skills. Jump! Protect! Swim! Reveal! Shoot! and Grab!

-Join forces and help Whitley to get to  the microscope. Save humanity from Duke Byron and his minions.

-Solve puzzles through almost 40 levels and guide Whitley to the goal.

-Accompany Whitley and the other Celluvas to make their way through the lab in this indie puzzle-platformer game!
